original_title: Sterling Steels named Official Roofing Partner of CONSTRUCT 2025
original_body_lines: Sterling Steels (Pvt) Ltd, a member of the E.B. Creasy Group and a leading provider of premium steel roofing solutions in Sri Lanka, is proud to announce its role as the Official Roofing Partner of CONSTRUCT 2025, the flagship construction industry exhibition organized by the National Construction Association of Sri Lanka (NCASL). Sterling Steels, formerly BlueScope Lysaght, brings over three decades of expertise in manufacturing advanced, durable, and sustainable roofing solutions. Backed by the 146-year legacy of its parent company, E.B. Creasy, the brand has consistently championed innovation and customer-centric practices that meet the evolving needs of Sri Lanka’s construction sector.

Sterling Steels aims to showcase its latest architectural designs and technologies, while creating opportunities for meaningful dialogue and collaboration among architects, engineers, contractors, consultants, and corporate leaders. The company’s presence at CONSTRUCT 2025 underscores its commitment to advancing sustainable building practices, promoting eco-conscious product innovation, and strengthening industry networks that fuel long-term growth.
